TopicTitle: How do you turn off sticky keys?

Articles.Content: I'm pretty sure most players ran into this problem.. Anyways the sticky keys message popped up twice on me, while I was getting into orbit, good thing I wasn't doing any important maneuvers but does anyone know how to turn off the pop-up message?
Press shift 5 times, should bring up a popup asking you to turn them on/off or bring you to your ease of access page so you can turn them off.
Thank you, annallia! I keep forgetting its that easy, and reinstall so infrequently I usually forget how to do this.
